fields.name: ArchiveRetentionInDays
fields.description: The table data archive retention in days. Calculated as (totalRetentionInDays-retentionInDays)

fields.name: LastPlanModifiedDate
fields.description: The timestamp that table plan was last modified (UTC).

fields.name: Plan
fields.description: Instruct the system how to handle and charge the logs ingested to this table.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Table's current provisioning state. If set to 'updating', indicates a resource lock due to ongoing operation, forbidding any update to the table until the ongoing operation is concluded.

fields.name: RestoredLogs
fields.description: Parameters of the restore operation that initiated this table.

fields.name: RetentionInDays
fields.description: The table retention in days, between 4 and 730. Setting this property to -1 will default to the workspace retention.

fields.name: RetentionInDaysAsDefault
fields.description: True - Value originates from workspace retention in days, False - Customer specific.

fields.name: SearchResults
fields.description: Parameters of the search job that initiated this table.

fields.name: TotalRetentionInDays
fields.description: The table total retention in days, between 4 and 2556. Setting this property to -1 will default to table retention.

fields.name: TotalRetentionInDaysAsDefault
fields.description: True - Value originates from retention in days, False - Customer specific.
